summary: This node is used to trigger other n8n workflows, allowing for modular and microservice-like workflow design.

parameters.name: events
parameters.description: Defines the event that triggers the workflow. Default is 'Workflow Call' triggered by another workflow.

parameters.name: inputSource
parameters.description: Select how input data will be provided to the workflow.

parameters.name: jsonExample
parameters.description: Provide an example JSON object to infer input fields and their types.

parameters.name: workflowInputs
parameters.description: Define expected input fields with their data types. If no inputs are provided, all data from the calling workflow will be passed through.
